mapper.select: /* bbs.dashBoard.list */ SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum , BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , REGDATE FROM DASH_BOARD WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

/* bbs.dashBoard.listPage */ SELECT a.BOARD_NO , a.BOARD_TITLE , a.BOARD_CONTENT , a.BOARD_WRITER , a.REGDATE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , REGDATE , ROWNUM AS rnum FROM DASH_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
) a WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
